## CameraAnimation class

Abstract class used as base to define camera animations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class CameraAnimation 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(mapView, name)](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new <code>CameraAnimation</code> object. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [duration](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.duration.md) |  | number | Duration of a whole animation in milliseconds. Defaults to <code>10</code> seconds. |
|  [easing](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.easing.md) |  | (k: number) =&gt; number | Easing function that control acceleration. Defaults to \[\[EasingFunction.Linear\]\]. |
|  [isRunning](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.isrunning.md) |  | boolean | Returns <code>true</code> if the animation is being played. |
|  [mapView](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.mapview.md) |  | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) |  |
|  [name](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.name.md) |  | string \| undefined |  |
|  [onFinished](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.onfinished.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Callback that gets triggered once the animation ends. |
|  [repeat](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.repeat.md) |  | number | Number of times the animation should be repeated. Defaults to <code>0</code>. |
|  [running](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.running.md) |  | boolean | <code>True</code> if animation is being played. |
|  [stopped](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.stopped.md) |  | boolean | <code>True</code> if the animation has been interrupted. |
|  [tween](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.tween.md) |  | TWEEN.Tween | Tweening controller. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [start(time, onFinished)](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.start.md) |  | Start the animation. |
|  [stop()](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.stop.md) |  |  |
|  [update(time)](./harp-map-controls.cameraanimation.update.md) |  | Update function is to be called before the next frame is rendered. |
